About Me

Inori Identity

Client: Inori Project
Role: Brand Identity Design
Year: 2013

Inori is an experimental programming language developed by Gianluca Stivan and Some other guy. The language implements some very new concepts such as coroutines, homoiconicity and OTHERCOOLPARADIGM.

Just like the language itself, the identity is experimental, and

The brand identity I developed for the project is

I was asked to develop a brand identity for the project
